collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_description: Includes scripts and some production information for the Ozzie and Harriet Show, 1946-1952, Suspense, 1946-1951, and television shows. Also includes a small amount of advertising spots and other radio, television and motion picture scripts. Additionally there is script material for an unproduced Orson Welles project.
